title: Rocket, fennel and orange salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '150g rocket', '2 oranges, peeled and segmented', '1 bulb fennel bulb, thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons sliced black olives']
